titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation concerning felts
Proclamations. 1613-12-02
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1603-1625 : James I)
James I, King of England, 1566-1625.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: Roystone the second day of December, in the xj. yeere of our reigne of England, France and Ireland, and of Scotland the 47.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
